message: Guidelines for filling the user sheet
Please go through the 'User roles' sheet to read and understand the accessibility of each role.
Please fill the user details (Name, contact number and email) in each of the sheets belonging to the role accordingly.
Please don't assign the duplicate user in both Microplan estimation approver and National microplan estimation approver roles.
Please don't assign duplicate users in both Facility boundary assigner and National facility boundary assigner roles.
Please don't assign duplicate users in both Population data approver and National population data approver roles.
